form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS ON BACK OF PAGE ONE BEFORE FILLING OUT MEMORANDUM U. S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1978-253-704 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles, Calif File No. A 21 344 739 C/N Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name NGUYEN, Than Thi F 10/21/15 Street Address 2999 Mendoza Dr. #A PLACE OF BIRTH Costa Mesa, California 92626 Hung Yen, Vietnam City, State, Zip NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Vietnamese PRIORITY DATE REMARKS Indochina Re fugee NONPREFERENCE Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 Public law 95-145 As of 6 75 (Other law Specify) Los Angeles, California at (Month) (Day) (Year) we PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission (Insert symbol) DATE OF RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) ACTION SEP 9 1978 SEP 9 1978 DD FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE DISTRICT Los 6-18-79 V.R.S.
